share.message: Check out Raymond Klanderman's Portfolio - Software Developer & AI Engineer

elevatorPitch.title: My Elevator Pitch
elevatorPitch.subtitle: Why Work With Me?
elevatorPitch.description: In this short video, I share my background, skills, and what makes me a unique candidate for your project or team.

paragraphs.0: Did you know many young people in Africa still struggle to access the right jobs, despite being highly skilled?
paragraphs.1: I'm Raymond Klanderman, a global AI Prompt Engineer, Fullstack Developer, and aspiring Data Analyst. I specialize in building smart digital tools that connect people to real opportunities—through the power of data and AI.
paragraphs.2: I recently led the development of AI Health Chat, a project that won 1st place in an innovation hackathon by using Grok to deliver personalized, privacy-focused health insights.
paragraphs.3: Now, I'm building Kazi Connect—an AI-powered job-matching platform that uses skill-based logic to pair youth with verified, scam-free jobs.
paragraphs.4: I turn data into decisions, and LLMs into accessible solutions—and I'm excited to collaborate with mission-driven teams creating real-world impact.

profile.title: Professional Profile
profile.description:
I build smart, scalable software and AI systems that solve real-world problems. My work spans full-stack engineering, machine learning, data analytics, cloud architecture, and automated deployment pipelines.

I design and ship production-ready applications using Python (FastAPI, Streamlit, Pandas, Polars), TypeScript/React/Next.js, Flutter, SQL/NoSQL, and Google Cloud. I specialize in intelligent workflows powered by APIs, autonomous agents, vector search, and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). My tooling includes Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant, LangChain, LlamaIndex, LangGraph, and modern LLM providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, Groq, and Ollama.

Beyond engineering, I turn data into insights and insights into features that become products people rely on. I also create clear technical content—tutorials, docs, and demos—that helps teams adopt and extend complex systems with confidence.

My mission is simple: build tools that understand people, and empower people to build even better tools. Curiosity drives my work, from rapid ML prototyping to productionizing agents and automating end-to-end workflows.

Always open to collaborating with teams building the next generation of human-centered AI.

tutaLearn.name: TutaLearn - African Educational Platform
tutaLearn.shortDescription: AI-powered educational PWA for African students
tutaLearn.description: A Progressive Web App (PWA) delivering AI-powered, culturally relevant education to African students via WhatsApp with offline support and localized content in English and Swahili.

codebaseGenius.name: Codebase Genius - AI Documentation System
codebaseGenius.shortDescription: AI-powered platform for automatic GitHub documentation
codebaseGenius.description: An AI-powered platform that automatically generates professional documentation for any GitHub repository using Google Gemini and a multi-agent system with interactive graph visualization.

weatherWise.name: WeatherWise Planner - NASA Earth Data for Smart Planning
weatherWise.shortDescription: Global climate planning tool using NASA Earth data
weatherWise.description: A global climate planning tool using 20+ years of NASA Earth data and Groq-powered AI to deliver location-specific historical weather insights and risk probabilities for agriculture, travel, and events.

aiHealth.name: AI Health Chat
aiHealth.description: An intelligent healthcare consultation application that uses advanced AI to provide preliminary medical guidance. Built with a secure Supabase backend for user data and medical history storage. Features conversational UI and symptom analysis.

civic.name: Civic Alert Lite
civic.description: A mobile application that empowers citizens to report and track civic issues in their communities. Integrated with geolocation services, push notifications, and administrative dashboards for local authorities to manage reported issues.

kaziConnect.name: Kazi Connect
kaziConnect.description: An innovative job marketplace that uses artificial intelligence to match job seekers with suitable opportunities. Features include CV analysis, skill assessment, automated application tracking, and personalized job recommendations based on user profile and preferences.
